      • P

        private byte[] P
        Permutation generated by code: // First 1850 fractional digit of Pi number. byte[] key = new BigInteger("14159265358979323846...5068006422512520511").toByteArray(); s = 0; P = new byte[256]; for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) { P[i] = (byte) i; } for (int m = 0; m < 768; m++) { s = P[(s + P[m & 0xff] + key[m % key.length]) & 0xff]; byte temp = P[m & 0xff]; P[m & 0xff] = P[s & 0xff]; P[s & 0xff] = temp; }
